alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Mitchell; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:53PM EDT until August 10 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MITCHELL...NORTHEASTERN BAKER...NORTHWESTERN COLQUITT AND SOUTHERN WORTH COUNTIES... At 553 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newton to 6 miles northwest of Riverside, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Baconton, Doerun, Riverside, Schley, Funston, Sale City, Bridgeboro, Minton, Flint, Livingston, Anderson City, Ticknor, Minnesota, Powelltown, Lester, Sigsbee, Pritchetts, Freeman and Poplar Arbor Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
